Heart

26 Dec 2014

利用 Computer Graphics 技术绘制的第一张渲染图：

实现使用了 GDI+ 的 bitmap 进行绘制，参照了 Milo 在知乎的回答。

  1 // Header.h
  2 
  3 #pragma once
  4 
  5 // Exclude rarely-used stuff from Windows headers
  6 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN  
  7 // Windows Header Files:
  8 #include <windows.h>
  9 
 10 // C RunTime Header Files
 11 #include <stdlib.h>
 12 #include <malloc.h>
 13 #include <memory.h>
 14 #include <tchar.h>
 15 
 16 // Source.cpp
 17 #include "Header.h"
 18 #include <ObjIdl.h>
 19 #include <gdiplus.h>
 20 #include <math.h>
 21 
 22 using namespace Gdiplus;
 23 #pragma comment (lib, "Gdiplus.lib")
 24 
 25 LRESULT CALLBACK WndProc(HWND, UINT, WPARAM, LPARAM);
 26 
 27 float f(float x, float y, float z) {
 28     float a = x * x + 9.0f / 4.0f * y * y + z * z - 1;
 29     return a * a * a - x * x * z * z * z - 9.0f / 80.0f * y * y * z * z * z;
 30 }
 31 
 32 float h(float x, float z) {
 33     for (float y = 1.0f; y >= 0.0f; y -= 0.001f)
 34         if (f(x, y, z) <= 0.0f)
 35             return y;
 36     return 0.0f;
 37 }
 38 
 39 VOID OnPaint(HDC hdc)
 40 {
 41     Graphics graphics(hdc);
 42     Bitmap *bitmap = new Bitmap(512, 512);
 43     INT width = 512;
 44     INT height = 512;
 45     Color color;
 46 
 47     for (INT sy = 0; sy < height; ++sy)
 48     {
 49         float z = 1.5f - sy * 3.0f / height;
 50         for (INT sx = 0; sx < width; ++sx)
 51         {
 52             float x = sx * 3.0f / width - 1.5f;
 53             float v = f(x, 0.0f, z);
 54             int r = 0;
 55             if (v <= 0.0f) {
 56                 float y0 = h(x, z);
 57                 float ny = 0.001f;
 58                 float nx = h(x + ny, z) - y0;
 59                 float nz = h(x, z + ny) - y0;
 60                 float nd = 1.0f / sqrtf(nx * nx + ny * ny + nz * nz);
 61                 float d = (nx + ny - nz) / sqrtf(3) * nd * 0.5f + 0.5f;
 62                 r = (int)(d * 255.0f);
 63             }
 64             color.SetValue(Color::MakeARGB(
 65                 (BYTE)(255),
 66                 (BYTE)(r),
 67                 (BYTE)(0),
 68                 (BYTE)(0)
 69                 ));
 70             bitmap->SetPixel(sx, sy, color);
 71         }
 72     }
 73 
 74     graphics.DrawImage(bitmap, 0, 0, 512, 512);
 75 
 76     delete bitmap;
 77 }
 78 
 79 INT WINAPI WinMain(HINSTANCE hInstance, HINSTANCE, PSTR, INT iCmdShow)
 80 {
 81     HWND hwnd;
 82     MSG msg;
 83     WNDCLASS wndClass;
 84     GdiplusStartupInput gdiInput;
 85     ULONG_PTR gdiToken;
 86 
 87     // Initial GDI+
 88     GdiplusStartup(&gdiToken, &gdiInput, NULL);
 89 
 90     wndClass.style = CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW;
 91     wndClass.lpfnWndProc = WndProc;
 92     wndClass.cbClsExtra = 0;
 93     wndClass.cbWndExtra = 0;
 94     wndClass.hInstance = hInstance;
 95     wndClass.hIcon = LoadIcon(NULL, IDI_APPLICATION);
 96     wndClass.hCursor = LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_ARROW);
 97     wndClass.hbrBackground = (HBRUSH)GetStockObject(WHITE_BRUSH);
 98     wndClass.lpszMenuName = NULL;
 99     wndClass.lpszClassName = TEXT("Heart!");
100 
101     RegisterClass(&wndClass);
102 
103     hwnd = CreateWindow(
104         TEXT("Heart!"),   // window class name
105         TEXT("Heart!"),  // window caption
106         WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW,      // window style
107         CW_USEDEFAULT,            // initial x position
108         CW_USEDEFAULT,            // initial y position
109         //CW_USEDEFAULT,            // initial x size
110         512,
111         //CW_USEDEFAULT,            // initial y size
112         512,
113         NULL,                     // parent window handle
114         NULL,                     // window menu handle
115         hInstance,                // program instance handle
116         NULL);                    // creation parameters
117 
118     ShowWindow(hwnd, iCmdShow);
119     UpdateWindow(hwnd);
120 
121     while (GetMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0))
122     {
123         TranslateMessage(&msg);
124         DispatchMessage(&msg);
125     }
126 
127     GdiplusShutdown(gdiToken);
128     return msg.wParam;
129 }
130 
131 LRESULT CALLBACK WndProc(HWND hwnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wp, LPARAM lp)
132 {
133     HDC hdc;
134     PAINTSTRUCT ps;
135 
136     switch (msg)
137     {
138     case WM_PAINT:
139         hdc = BeginPaint(hwnd, &ps);
140         OnPaint(hdc);
141         EndPaint(hwnd, &ps);
142         return 0;
143     case WM_DESTROY:
144         PostQuitMessage(0);
145         return 0;
146 
147     default:
148         return DefWindowProc(hwnd, msg, wp, lp);
149     }
150 }

图形学学得不多，做了一点小改进，利用了 FSAA(Full Screen Anti-Aliasing) 中的 SSAA(Super Sampling Anti-Aliasing)。

简单的做法就是，渲染更大分辨率(1024x1024)的图片，然后缩放，效果图如下 :

当然，这样的结果是运算时间多了4倍，很多时候这是不可接受的，所以需要 MSAA/CSAA/CFAA 等不同的抗锯齿方法。

下一步就是学习图形学理论，以及各种实际应用方法。
